TEXT.S: Calvin Booth nalecuhan i Reynoldsburg, Ohio, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Calvin Booth i 1999 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 35, namapili' tu nu Washington Wizards putiput. 5 bulad 7 demiad, 1976 a mihca, Calvin Booth, miunduay.
